message: Is anybody having issues getting the audio working?

Additional question, is anyone running iOS5beta on an iPhone 4 having issues streaming audio over 3g cell service? I hadn't played audio for a little while before they updated on June 1 and since then I've put iOS 5 on. trying to track down which might be the issue. On the app store i've seen a lot of reviews saying since the June 1 update the audio stopped working.... Any help would be great! Thanks!
